description: A mysterious girl who is an Alterian. Throughout the first season she is seen mostly as an observer of the events. Although she did encourage Shyamalan to activate the Ryuunka and played a part in its activation. During the second season, left without anywhere to go, she becomes Iruma`s assistant and the new manager of Birdy`s alter ego, Arita Shion.
name: Capella Titis
